result.execSummary:
One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Robert D Clay II is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

referral form to bail monitoring
Status conference at 02-01-2016 01:30 pm

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release.
- The court orders a signature bond on the condition that the defendant reports to and complies with Dane County Bail Monitoring (DCBM).  The defendant shall report to DCBM by 10:00 A.M. on the business day following his/her release from jail.  If defendant fails to comply with DCBM, cash bail is automatically set in the amount of $2500.00 (per case), as higher cash bail is necessary to assure appearance in court. BMP is removed as condition of bond.
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with Linda or Guy H.
- Defendant shall not consume alcohol.  
Defendant waived the time limits for Preliminary Hearing.
